revisions.rev:
{{Infobox OS | logo = [[File:Fluxbuntu logo.svg|50px]] | screenshot = [[File:Fluxbuntu-7.10 using Abiword.png|300px]] | caption = Fluxbuntu's default desktop
showing [[AbiWord]] in use | website = http://fluxbuntu.org | developer = Joe Jaxx, [http://launchpad.net/fluxbuntu-project The Fluxbuntu Linux Project] | family = [[Unix-like]] ([[List of Linux distributions#Unofficial_distributions|Ubuntu-based]]) | source model = [[Free and open source software|Free and Open Source]]{{cite web | title= Fluxbuntu Wiki Main Page | url=http://wiki.fluxbuntu.org/index.php?title=Main_Page | date = 16 October 2007| publisher = | accessdate = 2009-08-21}} | latest release version = 7.10 RC | latest release date = {{release date|2007|10|27}}{{cite web | last=Jaxx | first=Joe | title=Presenting Fluxbuntu 7.10 Release Candidate | url=http://community.fluxbuntu.org/index.php?topic=393.msg1701#msg1701 | date=October 27, 2007| work=The Fluxbuntu International Community News & Announcements | publisher= | accessdate=2009-05-11 }} {{Dead link|date=October 2010|bot=H3llBot}} | latest test version = 9.04 experimental | marketing target = Average to [[Hacker (hobbyist)|Advanced]] users | kernel type = [[Linux kernel|Linux]] | ui = [[Fluxbox]] (with [[ROX-Filer]]) | license = [[GNU General Public License|GPL]] and other licenses | working state = [[End-of-life (product)|EOL]]{{cite web | title=Ubuntu 7.10 reaches end-of-life on April 18, 2009 | url=http://www.ubuntu.com/news/ubuntu-7.10-eol | work=Ubuntu Press Release Archive | publisher=Canonical Ltd | date=March 23, 2009| accessdate=2009-05-11}} | supported_platforms = [[i386]], [[AMD64]]{{cite web | title=Get | url=http://wiki.fluxbuntu.org/index.php?title=Get | work=Fluxbuntu Wiki | publisher= | date= June 16, 2008| accessdate=2009-05-11}} | updatemodel = [[Advanced Packaging Tool|APT]] (front-ends available) | package manager = [[dpkg]] (front-ends like [[Synaptic Package Manager|Synaptic]] available) }} '''Fluxbuntu''' is a lightweight [[Linux distribution]] which uses the [[Fluxbox]] [[window manager]] and is based on [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]]. By contrast, Ubuntu uses the [[Unity (user interface)|Unity]] (previously [[GNOME]]) desktop environment, [[Kubuntu]] uses [[KDE]], and [[Xubuntu]] uses [[Xfce]], all of which are somewhat more demanding of computer memory and resources. Fluxbuntu is designed to be versatile, while minimizing the need of system resources (similar to [[Lubuntu]], which uses [[LXDE]]). Although its website states that the project is still active, as there have been no updates since 2007, the project is considered to be dormant.{{cite web | title=Fluxbuntu homepage | url=http://fluxbuntu.org/ | work= | publisher=The Fluxbuntu Linux Project | date=2008-11-17 | accessdate=2009-05-11}} (The opening page of the website has a Last-Modified date of November 2008.) == System requirements == Fluxbuntu is currently supporting [[Intel x86]], [[AMD64]] and [[PowerPC]] architectures. The minimum [[system requirements]] are a 300 [[MHz]] x86 processor, 64 [[megabyte|MB]] RAM and 2 [[gigabyte|GB]] hard disk space. The single install disk is 306 MB for the x86 version. == Packages == As well as using the Fluxbox window manager, Fluxbuntu excludes many [[Application software|application]]s and [[Daemon (computer software)|daemon]]s (a computer program that runs in the background) from Ubuntu which makes it even more lightweight. It also replaces a large number of Ubuntu's default applications with lightweight alternatives such as: * '''[[AbiWord]]''' and '''[[Gnumeric]]''' replace [[OpenOffice.org]] as the default office programs * '''[[Kazehakase]]''' replaces [[Mozilla Firefox]] as the default Web browser * '''[[Claws Mail]]''' replaces [[Evolution (software)|Evolution]] as the default e-mail client. ==See also== {{Portal|Free software}} * [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] * [[Kubuntu]] * [[Xubuntu]] * [[Lubuntu]] ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== {{commonscat|Fluxbuntu}} * [http://fluxbuntu.org/ Official website] * [https://launchpad.net/fluxbuntu Fluxbuntu page on Launchpad] {{Ubuntu}} {{Linux distributions}} [[Category:Ubuntu (operating system) derivatives]] {{Linux-distro-stub}} [[ar:ÙÙÙØ³ Ø¨ÙÙØªÙ]] [[bs:Fluxbuntu]] [[ca:Fluxbuntu]] [[cs:Fluxbuntu]] [[da:Fluxbuntu]] [[de:Fluxbuntu]] [[es:Fluxbuntu]] [[fr:Fluxbuntu]] [[hr:Fluxbuntu]] [[id:Fluxbuntu]] [[it:Fluxbuntu]] [[lt:Fluxbuntu]] [[hu:Fluxbuntu]] [[nl:Fluxbuntu]] [[ja:Fluxbuntu]] [[pl:Fluxbuntu]] [[pt:Fluxbuntu]] [[ro:Fluxbuntu]] [[ru:Fluxbuntu]] [[simple:Fluxbuntu]] [[tr:Fluxbuntu]] [[uk:Fluxbuntu]] [[zh:Fluxbuntu]]
